overview:
In the past, Aaron was apart of an effort to build RAZOR Advertising (the name came from his Dream house in California called “The RAZOR”). At RAZOR Advertising he was able to bring on several key resources and individuals to Branchr.

Well connected within the industry, Aaron loves to meet new people and share ideas in business and technology.

Ambitious and a visionary at heart, Aaron Ray seeks to help others live life to the fullest. “Follow your passion, your dream no matter what they say because at the end of the day, its you and your choices that matter. Nothing else. Entrepreneurship is a journey that is an unique experience and lifestyle where one can live their lives on their terms”.

A big believer in quotes, he is often times found quoting famous figures from history and putting a smile on everyone’s faces with his jokes.

Favorite Quotes: “We are all inventors, each sailing out on a voyage of discovery, guided each by a private chart, of which there is no duplicate. The world is all gates, all opportunities.” -Ralph Waldo Emerson

“Cherish your visions and your dreams as they are the children of your soul, the blueprints of your ultimate achievements.” - Napoleon Hill
